articles.title: FACTBOX-Monkeypox cases around the world
articles.description:
It has since confirmed "several" more patients, without stating the exact number. * PORTUGAL reported 10 new confirmed cases on May 25, bringing the total to 49.
* SLOVENIA confirmed its first case on May 24. * SPAIN confirmed seven new cases on May 25, bringing the country's total to 55.
AMERICAS * ARGENTINA reported its first suspected case on May 23.
articles.content:
Nearly 20 countries where monkeypox is not endemic have reported outbreaks of the viral disease, with more than 100 confirmed or suspected infections mostly in Europe.
The outbreaks are raising alarm because monkeypox, which spreads through close con... [2111 chars]

articles.title: Diego Maradona tribute aeroplane launched in Argentina ahead of World Cup
articles.description: An aeroplane that will act as a flying museum in tribute to the late Diego Maradona has been unveiled in his native Argentina.
articles.content:
A n aeroplane that will act as a flying museum in tribute to the late Diego Maradona has been unveiled in his native Argentina.

articles.title: Man City new boy Julian Alvarez warms up for move by scoring six times for River Plate
articles.description: Manchester City's January signing Julian Alvarez, who is currently on loan at River Plate in Argentina, scored six goals for his loan club on Wednesday night in the Copa Libertadores

articles.title: Deigo Maradona Tribute Plane Unveiled in Argentina
articles.description: An aeroplane dedicated to Argentine great Diego Maradona is designed as a flying museum in tribute to the former World Cup winner
articles.content:
An aeroplane dedicated to Argentine great Diego Maradona was unveiled on Wednesday ahead of a journey that will end at the World Cup in Qatar later this year.
The Tango D10S – a 12-seater financed by an Argentine fintech company – is designed as a fl... [1725 chars]

articles.title: Maradona tribute plane unveiled in Argentina
articles.description: An aeroplane dedicated to Argentine great Diego Maradona was unveiled on Wednesday ahead of a journey that will end at the World Cup in Qatar later this year.
articles.content: Maradona's daughters Giannina and Dalma take part in an event to launch the world tour to Qatar’s World Cup of the TANGO D10S, a themed airplane with a museum with objects used by late soccer legend Diego Armando Maradona, in Buenos Aires, Argentina ... [2176 chars]

articles.title: South America Covid cases soar, but vaccines bring optimism
articles.description: Covid cases are surging in the southern tip of South America but Argentina, Chile and Uruguay hope high vaccination rates will help stave off deaths.
articles.content:
After a reprieve of months, confirmed cases of COVID-19 are surging in the southern tip of South America. But officials in Argentina, Chile and Uruguay hope high vaccination rates mean this latest wave will not be as deadly as previous ones.
At the s... [4936 chars]

articles.title: Canada's Felix Auger-Aliassime advances to third round at French Open
articles.description: PARIS — Montreal's Felix Auger-Aliassime scored a straight-set 6-0, 6-3 and 6-4 victory over Camilo Ugo Carabelli of Argentina to move on to the third round of the French Open on Wednesday.
